Come experience the world famous 99 Holes of golf at the Rotunda. Englewood, Fla. was named ‚Äú#2 of the Top Ten emerging travel destinations in the U.S.‚Äù by TripAdvisor.com. Port Charlotte, Charlotte Harbor and Punta Gorda were rated as one of the ‚ÄúBest Places to Live & Retire in the South‚Äù by Money Magazine. A haven for outdoor enthusiasts, Charlotte Harbor & the Gulf Islands has been named one of the ‚Äú10 Greatest Places to Sail in the United States‚Äù by Sail Magazine. ‚ÄúSOMETIMES OPPORTUNITIES COME ONCE IN A LIFETIME.‚Äù MYAKKA RIVER MOTORCOACH RESORT Everyone at Myakka River Motorcoach Resort wants to welcome you to our little piece of paradise. Myakka spent millions designing and building the resort to ensure that every detail has been looked after. We had the vision to make a resort where you can be yourself, slip on your flip flops and put your feet up. A resort that was all about casual luxury and living an active healthy lifestyle. We hope you enjoy our unique vision and have a truly wonderful time here. We look forward to meeting you at our next sunset patio meet and greet! ‚ÄúSTUNNING RIVERSIDE MOTORCOACH RESORT. THEY WERE JUST AMAZING. THE PLACE IS SO FRIENDLY AND WELCOMING.‚Äù ‚ÄúThere were so many activities and so much to do. They did it right, and have kept the community smaller. It‚Äôs very down-to-earth. Everyone says hi and waves. I feel so welcome. It truly is wonderful here.‚Äù Julie Smith Jarvis Web Solutions Ltd. ‚ÄúMy husband and I have felt welcome from the moment we entered the resort. Everyone has made us feel so at home. You can see the pride in everything they do. It‚Äôs a true gem.‚Äù Sandra Whyte Jarvis Web Solutions Ltd. PLEASE CONTACT THE OFFICE FOR ADDITIONAL INFORMATION IF YOUR COACH IS GREATER THAN 10 YEARS OLD. STUNNING RIVERSIDE MOTORCOACH RESORT We are less than an hour south of Sarasota, located halfway between Tampa and Naples on the Southwest Florida Gulf Coast. Charlotte Harbor and the Gulf Islands are a charming collection of nine coastal communities surrounding the state‚Äôs second largest harbor. We‚Äôre 15-20 minutes from Englewood‚Äôs world-renowned beaches, Boca Grande, and the amazing Myakka and Charlotte Harbor State Parks. All of our lots have spacious brick paver pads and living areas. All lots are FHU 50 amp minimum with state of the art free wi-fi. Nature View Lots Surround yourself with luscious greenery. Enjoy the quiet privacy of one of our Nature View sites. All sites are back-in except for sites 26-29 and one pull-thru site (3). These lots typically provide the most space, as they back up to resort common areas and wooded areas behind. Some have lake views across the street, with several having unobstructed lake views. Explore the individual lot descriptions and photos to find your perfect site. See Nature View Rentals Lake Front Lots Enjoy an unobstructed view of one of our three lakes with a Lake View site. All of our Lake View sites are pull-in with one exception (47). Explore the individual lot descriptions and photos to find your perfect site. See Lake Front Rentals River Front Lots Enjoy the spectacular sunsets over the Myakka River with one of our River View lots. All of our River View lots have spacious brick paver pads and are pull-in, facing the river. These sites are closest to the boardwalk. FHU 50 amp and free wi-fi provided with every lot. Explore the individual lot descriptions and photos to find your perfect site. See River Front Rentals Luxury RV Lots For Rent Please Note: Lots listed may not be available to rent. Click here for availability or contact us for details. Lot 3 This lot has been turned into a pull through lot and has two pedestals so the coach can face both directions.  Oversized lot features extended pavers and a view of the lake and fountain across the street.  Don't miss the opportunity to rent one of our beautiful and exclusive, luxury 'Class A' motorcoach rv lots in Florida. Read More Lot 4 Enjoy this beautiful north facing lakeview site. North facing sites are in high demand, providing shade much of the day and the ability to enjoy the outdoors during every season. Lot 4 has the best of both worlds ‚Äì an unobstructed view of Myakka‚Äôs largest lake in front, and woods behind, providing lots of privacy. This site has extended brick pavers, providing plenty of outside living space. From Lot 4, you have a very short walk to the clubhouse, pool, pickleball and river boardwalk. Don't miss the opportunity to rent one of our beautiful and exclusive, luxury 'Class A' motorcoach rv lots in Florida. Read More Lot 7 - with Lanai A beautiful Nature View back in lot.  A direct view of the lake and fountain across the street.  Owner allows the use of the screened casita that features a TV, furniture, refrigerator, enclosed bathroom with shower and laundry.  Extra charge for the use of casita.  Easy access to all the amenities. Don't miss the opportunity to rent one of our beautiful and exclusive, luxury 'Class A' motorcoach rv lots in Florida. A direct view of the lake and fountain across the street.  Expanded pavers, use of the screened lanai, furniture and fire pit at no extra charge.  Easy access to all the amenities. Don't miss the opportunity to rent one of our beautiful and exclusive, luxury 'Class A' motorcoach rv lots in Florida. This is a desirable north facing lot with more shade in the afternoon.  Renter is responsible for leaving the lot and lanai as clean as when they arrived.
